ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED( Primary_Contact__c ) && ( ISBLANK(Primary_Contact__r.FirstName) || ISBLANK(Primary_Contact__r.LastName) || ISBLANK(Primary_Contact__r.MailingCity) || ISBLANK(Primary_Contact__r.MailingPostalCode) || ISBLANK( Primary_Contact__r.Email ) || ISBLANK( Primary_Contact__r.MailingCountry ) || ISBLANK( Primary_Contact__r.MailingStreet ) || ISBLANK( Primary_Contact__r.MailingState ) || ( ISBLANK( Primary_Contact__r.HomePhone ) && ISBLANK( Primary_Contact__r.Phone ) ) ), Primary_Contact__c != NULL)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please review primary contact. Full name, full address, email and phone (Phone or Home Phone) are required.
